info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 10:16PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Cumberland and northwestern Prince Edward Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1016 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Prospect, or 7 miles northwest of Hampden Sydney, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Farmville around 1035 PM EDT. Guinea Mills around 1055 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Raines Tavern, Tuggle, Elam, Reeds, Stoddert, Allens Mill and Hawk. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM EDT for central Virginia.
